display_long_description:
# 🚀 TURN YOUR HOME INTO THE LAST SPACESHIP
Welcome to **The Last Galaxy**, an auto-adaptive and fully immersive Mixed Reality game that transforms your entire environment into interactive spaceship stations using your Teleporter. Connect multiple physical rooms into a shared virtual experience, where you and your friends can collaborate and engage in immersive multiplayer gameplay — or embark on the mission solo.
[media]
###
## 🔮 **TRANSFORM YOUR WORLD WITH THE TELEPORTER**
Use the Teleporter to morph your surroundings into stations aboard your spaceship:
- **Gunner Room**: Defend against cosmic threats.
- **Engine Room**: Keep the ship's heart beating.
- **Commander Room**: Navigate through the asteroid fields.

Every wall and object becomes part of your interactive adventure thanks to the 2Sync SDK!
[media]
###
## 🌐 **CONNECT ACROSS THE COSMOS**

Link multiple physical rooms into a shared virtual experience as a unified spaceship. Wave to your friend across the ship's deck, collaborate and communicate in real-time with integrated voice chat.

###
## **📡 SURVIVE THE ASTEROID FIELD & 🏆 CHALLENGE THE VOID**
Man all stations to navigate through an unexpected asteroid field. Compete for the high score as you strive to reach the galaxy's center and escape entropy. How far can your crew venture into the heart of the cosmos?

###
## **🌌 EARLY ADVENTURE**
We welcome your feedback to expand **The Last Galaxy** with more stations and a deeper storyline. Help shape the future of the game and join us on this voyage!

###
**🎮 Other Games:**
- Mixed Snow Worlds
- House Defender
